price: Je! Mola wenu Mlezi amekuteulieni wavulana, na Yeye akawafanya Malaika ni banati zake? Kwa hakika nyinyi mnasema usemi mkubwa.
arabic: أَفَأَصۡفَىٰكُمۡ رَبُّكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ وَٱتَّخَذَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنَٰثًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: Subhanahu anayachukia wayasemayo makafiri kwamba Malaika ni mabinti wa Mwenyezi Mungu. Anasema: Mola wenu Mlezi amekufadhilisheni kuliko Mwenyewe kwa kukupeni nyinyi watoto wanaume wenye nguvu, na Yeye akawafanya Malaika ni banati zake kwa mnavyo dai? Kwa maneno yenu haya mnazua matusi makubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: afa-aṣfākum rabbukum bil-banīna wa-ittakhadha mina al-malāikati ināthan innakum lataqūlūna qawlan ʿaẓīman
translations: Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
Then has your Lord chosen (for) you
